page.title: 05CITIZENS BAND RADIO
page.content: The CB (Citizen Band Radio) is one of the best means of communication for all types of people, particularly disabled or elderly people who cannot communicate face to face. There are many types of CB: Harvard, Binatone, Homebase and even the illegal Dx'er. The language of CB is totally different ffom our normal language. They use numbers to represent words. e.g. 10-1 means you are crazy, 10-10 means goodbye. There are 40 channels available for use but channel 9 is for emergency only. The illegal Dx'er interferes with the police,fire services, ambulances and the armed forces. You can reach anywhere in the world with the Dx'er but the range of the legal CB's is usually about ten miles.
